We are seeking a highly analytical and tech-savvy AI & Web Optimization Specialist to join our team. In this pivotal role, you will be responsible for merging AI-driven efficiencies with high-performance web design to maximize client conversions. You will not only optimize website speed and landing page aesthetics but also integrate AI workflows and tools to enhance lead generation and scalability. You will collaborate closely with our SEO, design, and strategy teams to ensure every digital asset is a high-converting machine for our local business clients.



3. Employment Type & Work Schedule



Role: Part-Time (Contractor)

Hours: 20 hours per week

Location: 100% Remote

Time Zone: Must be available to work during AST (Atlantic Standard Time) or U.S. EST/PST business hours.



4. Compensation



Hourly Rate: USD $4/hour (including fees of chosen payment platform)

Invoice: Contractors are mandated to submit invoices that include their preferred payment channel.

Payment schedule: Bi-weekly payment issued every two (2) weeks upon receipt and approval of an invoice for services rendered.

Contractor responsible for all applicable taxes and statutory obligations



5. Core Responsibilities



Workflow AI Integration: Optimize marketing workflows and website content using AI to increase output quality and speed.

Website Performance: Audit and improve website speed, mobile responsiveness, and Core Web Vitals.

Landing Page Mastery: Design, test, and refine high-converting landing pages using A/B testing and CRO principles.

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner with SEO specialists to align site structure with search intent and with designers to maintain brand integrity.

Multi-Client Management: Simultaneously manage and track optimization deliverables for 10+ active local business accounts.

Reporting: Provide clear, data-backed reports on performance improvements and ROI.



6. AI Optimization Responsibilities



AI-Powered Content: Implement AI-assisted content strategies to improve relevance and searchability.

Lead Gen Automation: Deploy and optimize AI chatbots and virtual assistants to capture and qualify leads 24/7.

Process Automation: Identify and implement AI automations for repetitive web and marketing tasks.

AI Search Optimization: Prepare client web entities for AI-driven discovery platforms (SGE, Perplexity, etc.) through structured data and semantic optimization.



7. Website & Landing Page Responsibilities



Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Conduct deep-dive audits to identify friction points in the user journey.

Funnel Optimization: Streamline the path from landing page arrival to lead submission or purchase.

Technical Health: Ensure all sites are optimized for speed, security, and schema markup.

UX/UI Alignment: Implement design changes that prioritize user experience without compromising marketing goals.



8. Required Skills & Qualifications



Experience: 2+ years in AI optimization, Web Performance, or a Conversion-focused digital role.

Tech Stack: Expert knowledge of AI tools (ChatGPT Plus, Gemini, Claude) and automation platforms (Zapier/Make).

Web Platforms: Proficiency in WordPress (Elementor, Divi, or similar builders) and landing page tools.

Analytical Skills: Strong ability to interpret Google Analytics 4 (GA4) and Heatmap data (Hotjar/Clarity).

Communication: Ability to explain complex technical optimizations in simple, results-oriented terms.



9. Preferred / Nice-to-Have Qualifications



Direct experience working within a digital marketing agency environment.

Certification in Google Analytics, specialized CRO training, or something closely similar.

Experience with "AI SEO" and structured data for modern search engines.



10. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)



Conversion Rate: Significant lift in landing page and website conversion percentages.

Page Performance: Improvement in Core Web Vitals and mobile load speeds.

Automation ROI: Reduction in manual hours per task through AI implementation.

Lead Volume: Increase in qualified leads generated through AI-enhanced channels.



11. Tools & Platforms



AI: ChatGPT (Custom GPTs), Gemini, Zapier, Claude.

Web/CRO: WordPress, GTM, Hotjar, Google Optimize (or alternatives).

Analytics: GA4, Google Search Console, PageSpeed Insights.

Project Management: ClickUp, Asana, or Slack.



12. Technical Requirements (Mandatory)



To maintain our standard of excellence in a remote environment, the following are strictly required:

PC / Laptop Requirements

Operating System: Windows 10+ or MacOS 11+

RAM: 8 GB minimum

Storage Space: At least 250GB or 1TB 

Processor: i5 or equivalent (i7+ recommended)

Backup PC/Laptop in case of an issue

Verification: You must provide a screenshot of system specifications.



Internet Requirements

Speed: Minimum 50 Mbps stable internet (Fiber preferred).

Verification: Must submit a recent speed test result screenshot.

Redundancy: Must have a reliable backup internet source (Secondary ISP or mobile hotspot).



Backup & Power Requirements

Hardware: Access to a backup laptop or secondary workstation.

Power Redundancy: UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply), generator, or power station to ensure uptime during local power interruptions.



Backup & Power Requirements:

Hardware: Access to a backup laptop or secondary device.

Power: Must have an electricity backup solution (UPS, generator, or power station) to remain online during local power outages.



13. Work Environment Expectations



A dedicated, quiet, and professional remote workspace.

Punctuality in virtual meetings and proactive communication via Slack/Email.

Commitment to documenting all AI prompts and web optimization workflows.



14. We want to know more about you



These questions are designed to assess the candidate’s abilities, technical skills, and ability to deliver excellent results.

- Describe your step-by-step process for optimizing a website using AI tools and web performance best practices.

- Which AI platforms, web analytics, or optimization tools do you use most, and how have they improved your projects’ performance?

- Can you provide an example of a project where you significantly improved website speed, user experience, or conversion rates using AI-driven strategies?

- How do you balance automation via AI with manual optimization to ensure accuracy, relevance, and website quality?

- Explain a challenge you faced while implementing AI or web optimization solutions remotely, and how you resolved it.



15. How to apply



To be considered for this role, please submit the following requirements in full:

- Answer the five (5) screening questions listed in the “We Want to Know More About You” section.

- Confirmation of your ability to work 20 hours/week during AST/EST business hours.

- Complete an internet speed test and provide a shareable link to a screenshot of your results that can be viewed by anyone with the link.

- Provide a shareable link to a screenshot of your PC or laptop specifications with viewers’ access enabled.

- Submit a Portfolio via a shareable link; Examples or case studies showing AI integration, landing page builds, or conversion lifts that can be accessed by anyone with the link.

- Include your CV/resume (PDF format) through a shareable link with viewers’ access enabled.

- Record a 2–3 minute self-introduction video via Loom discussing your previous job roles, industries you’ve worked in, key career highlights, Innovations, why you are the best candidate for this role, and how do you d
 which tasks to automate versus which tasks require manual oversight—and why. Provide a shareable Loom link that can be viewed by anyone.





Incomplete applications or submissions without proper shareable links will not be reviewed.

title: Administration Assistant - Australian Mortgage Broking
description:
Who we are



Blambles Finance Group is a boutique finance broking business based in Brisbane, Australia. We pride ourselves on helping our customers get the best deal from our residential and commercial lender partners.

We are looking for a self motivated and highly efficient person to support the continued growth of our business on a permanent full time basis. You will work closely with our existing Filipino based virtual assistants and an Australian based residential & commercial mortgage broker.



Key requirements for the role

• Highly proficient in Microsoft Office 365, with excellent Excel skills

• Excellent English communicator, both written and oral

• Self motivated to complete tasks with minimal supervision and prioritise competing tasks / deadlines

• Stable prior employment

• High attention to detail



You will be rewarded with

• A role which is 100% remote allowing you to work from home

• Competitive remuneration, and future eligibility for a performance bonus and public holiday / annual leave

• A flexible working environment including Australian based hours (AEST)

• The ability to work closely with our Filipino support staff



To apply for the role please,



:

o Outline why you would be a good fit for the job based on your past experience?

o Current remuneration and expected remuneration?



In addition, please complete a short online test by clicking on the link below:





Please note only qualified applicants who meet the minimum criteria, follow the instructions outlined above and who score highly in the online test will be considered for this role. We will only respond to applicants who will be considered further. If you have not heard from us within 7 days of your application, it is likely that your application has been unsuccessful.



Essential Duties

• Saving all
s in the Mercury inbox to relevant client opportunities

• Managing the centralised inbox including,

o Distribution of
s in the centralised inbox to the appropriate people, folders and filing in Mercury

o Setting up auto forward rules and auto-flows to improve efficiency

• Completes all tasks correctly and on time



You will be provided with appropriate training and supported by our existing team and given the opportunity to progress your career.

title: Experienced Video Editor (Short-Form & Long-Form, AI Knowledge Required)
description:
About Us



We are a pet care brand offering daycare, boarding, and grooming built around a wellness-first approach. We create educational content to help pet parents understand our core pillars and how these support their pets’ wellbeing.



What You’ll Do



Edit short-form videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok)

Edit long-form videos (YouTube educational content)

Create promotional and ad content for social media

Add subtitles and supporting visuals (stock, graphics, or AI)

Select appropriate music and follow brand guidelines

Coordinate with the team for smooth workflow



Why This Role Is Unique



Many care practices cannot be filmed directly. Your role is to make invisible processes understandable using visuals. AI knowledge is required — you will generate and integrate visuals to explain concepts clearly and naturally. The goal is clarity and educational storytelling, not flashy effects.



What We’re Looking For



Strong pacing and storytelling

Clear subtitle formatting

Ability to explain concepts visually using AI and other tools

Attention to detail and openness to feedback



Project-Based First

This starts as a trial project to see if it’s a good fit. If it works well, it can grow into part-time or full-time depending on workload.



How to Apply



Please send:



Resume

Portfolio link

3–5 video samples

Sample of AI-generated visuals



We look forward to seeing your work!

s (welcome, abandoned cart, post purchase, etc)

title: Senior eCommerce Bookkeeper (QBO & Ecom Focused)
description:
We’re an established eCommerce team that values high autonomy. We’re looking for a financial backbone. - Are QBO-certified and hold a CPA or CB designation

- Are a self-starter who treats the books as if they were your own business

- Have hands-on experience with US GAAP and IRS policies specific to eCommerce



If this sounds like you, we’d love to meet you.



Logistics:



- Fully remote. We trust you to manage your time and deliver outcomes

- We use Slack for alignment. Comfort with camera-on financial review meetings is required

- We’re looking for a long-term partner, not a short-term freelancer



To apply, send a copy of your resume and answer these questions:



1. What are your hobbies?

2. What’s your ideal work environment, and how do you contribute to a great team culture?

3. What makes you stay in a company long-term?

title: SEO Consultant
description:
About Us:

MageMontreal is a dynamic e-commerce consulting firm dedicated to providing top-notch solutions to our clients. As we expand our team, we are seeking a talented SEO Specialis to join us. This role will focus exclusively on SEO strategy and execution for the MageMontreal website. We offer a competitive base salary, fully remote work, an international work atmosphere, and endless growth opportunities.



Job Description:

The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in SEO, sales, and client-facing consulting, with the ability to develop and enhance our SEO offering, automate delivery processes, and drive profitability. This role will focus exclusively on SEO strategy and execution for the MageMontreal website. This is a remote freelance position with an estimated commitment of 10 hours per week, with the potential for full-time employment for the right candidate.



Responsibilities:

- Develop SEO Offering: Create and refine our SEO service offerings to meet client needs and market trends

- Templatize and Automate Services: Design and implement templates and automation processes to streamline service delivery and increase efficiency

- Sales and Client Management: Sell SEO services to existing clients and sales prospects, showcasing the value and impact of our offerings

- Team Management: Lead and manage a team of SEO executants, providing clear guidelines, performance reviews, and ongoing support

- Training: Train the team on the effective use of SEMRush and other SEO tools to ensure high-quality service delivery

- Profitability: Ensure the profitability of our e-commerce SEO services by managing resources effectively and optimizing service offerings



Requirements:

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in an SEO agency or as a freelance SEO consultant

- Proven sales experience with a strong ability to pitch and sell SEO services

- Extensive client-facing consulting experience

- Bilingual in French and English 

- Ability to work in the EST timezone (required)

- Excellent communication and leadership skills

- Proficiency in SEMRush and other SEO tools

- Strong organizational and project management skills



What’s In It for You:

- This is a fully remote position

- Minimum hours are not guaranteed

- Freelance contract for an estimated 10 hours per week to start

- Potential for a full-time employment contract for the right candidate



If you are a seasoned SEO professional with a passion for driving results and developing innovative solutions, we encourage you to apply. Join us and help take our SEO services to the next level!

title: Freelance Videographer, AI Commercial Advertising (E commerce)
description:
Contract: Freelance

Availability: Part time, on demand

Location: Remote, international (French fluency required)

Languages: French and English (bilingual delivery required)



Job description:

We are an e commerce agency producing conversion focused advertising content for our own brand and for clients. We are looking for a freelance videographer with proven commercial advertising experience and strong hands on experience creating videos using AI tools.



Your role will focus on creating short, high impact ad videos for Google Ads, YouTube Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, with bilingual (French and English) deliverables.



This role is ideal for a videographer who understands performance marketing, modern creative workflows, and AI powered production, and who stays current as tools evolve.



What you will do:

• Produce short form commercial advertising videos (6 to 60 seconds)

• Create promotional videos for services, case studies, and campaigns

• Deliver bilingual video assets (French and English)

• Use AI tools to generate or enhance video content (visuals and voice)

• Edit and finalize videos using professional editing software

• Adapt formats and messaging for Google, YouTube, and LinkedIn

• Iterate quickly based on feedback and campaign needs



Required experience:

Mandatory

• Commercial video production experience

• Professional use of AI for video creation

• Strong video editing and post production skills

• Fluent French (spoken and written)

• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines



Nice to have

• Experience with e commerce brands or digital agencies

• Familiarity with performance marketing and ad creative

• Experience with AI avatars, generative visuals, synthetic voice



Tools (current stack and expectations):

You are expected to be comfortable with most of the following, and willing to learn new tools as AI capabilities evolve:



AI video generation

• Google Veo 3.1

• Sora

• Other AI video tools as required over time



AI voice generation

• ElevenLabs



Editing and motion

• Premiere Pro, After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, or equivalent

• Motion graphics and animation tools

• Audio editing and voice over integration



Budget:

Open to hourly rates or per project pricing.

Please include your typical rate structure in your proposal.



How to apply (important):

Your proposal must include:



- A portfolio of traditional videos (real footage, classic editing)

- A portfolio of AI generated or AI assisted videos

- A clear label indicating which videos are traditional and which are AI

- A short explanation of how AI was used in your AI video examples



Proposals without this separation will not be reviewed.

title: Customer Service / Data Entry / Business Intern / Marketing
description:
We are a U.S.-based, 10-year Amazon FBA business, looking for a few talented, enthusiastic A-players who have big growth potential within our company. Our initial hourly rate is $3/hr, with weekly payments via PayPal. This is a long-term opportunity with significant growth potential for those who demonstrate the capacity to take on more responsibility and excel in their role.



Prior experience is not required.



However, the ideal candidate should possess the following qualities:



1. Strong independent research skills, with the ability to acquire new knowledge through self-directed learning and thorough investigation.

title: Executive Assistant + Ops Coordinator
description:
We’re hiring an Operations EA / Workflow Manager to run the CEO’s daily command center: inbox triage, calendar management, task routing, project tracking, and basic automation monitoring (Make/Integromat). You’ll help keep multiple business lanes moving (credit operations, real estate wholesaling, content, and automation).



This role is for someone who is fast, organized, and proactive. You don’t need to be an expert in credit or real estate—but you must be excellent at systems, follow-through, and clean communication.



Responsibilities



Daily Command Center



Triage
s and categorize (Bills, CRA/Credit, Contracts, GoHighLevel, Vendors, Other)



Calendar scheduling, confirmations, reminders, agendas



Convert messages/notes into tasks (Airtable/Trello) with owners + due dates



Maintain an “Open Loops / Waiting On / Blockers” tracker updated daily



Send a daily CEO briefing (AM) + recap (EOD)



Systems & Automation Support



Keep Airtable/Trello clean and up-to-date (statuses, links, deadlines)



Monitor Make scenarios for failures; report issues clearly (what broke, screenshot, recommended fix)



Document simple SOP checklists as we standardize workflows



Admin/Ops Coordination



Draft replies using templates (CEO approves sensitive items)



Coordinate handoffs with other VAs (credit processor, sales VA)



Organize Google Drive folders (naming + filing)



Required Skills (must-have)



Executive assistant or operations VA experience (2+ years preferred)



Strong written English and clear communication



Excellent organization + deadline discipline



Airtable or Trello (must be comfortable)



Google Workspace (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs)



Slack (daily communication)



Bonus Skills (nice-to-have)



Make (Integromat) or Zapier automation monitoring



GoHighLevel familiarity (pipelines, tags, tasks)



Experience supporting sales ops or client-based services



Deliverables (non-negotiable)



Daily CEO Brief (AM)



Daily Open Loops list (EOD)



Weekly Planning Pack (priorities + deadlines + risks)





To Apply



Reply with:



A short summary of your EA/Ops experience



The tools you’ve used (Airtable/Trello/Make/GHL)



Your internet speed + workspace setup



Confirm you can work with US Eastern overlap



Include the word “COMMANDCENTER” in your first line

title: Go High Level Automation Specialist at Market Leaders
description:
Go High Level Automation Specialist

Company: Market Leaders

Location: Remote (Philippines/Anywhere)

Salary: SGD $800–1,200/month (based on experience)


/testimonial-page



Who We Are

Market Leaders is on a mission to become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. We bring Asian wisdom to global business education—think Bruce Lee's philosophy meets world-class marketing execution.



Our culture? Peaceful & Profitable. High performance, zero drama. Team-first, always.

We’re a 7-person remote team building something extraordinary—and we need someone who gets it.



The Opportunity

We’re looking for a Go High Level Automation Specialist who doesn’t just build workflows but acts as an architect of client transformation.



This isn’t a “set it and forget it” role. You’ll work directly with clients helping them build Peaceful & Profitable businesses through intelligent automation. Your work will touch thousands of entrepreneurs across Asia and beyond.



What makes this role unique:

Direct client impact: Your automations change real businesses

Creative + technical blend: Strategy AND execution

Cultural mission: Help people build better businesses

World-class team: Learn from (and teach) exceptional humans

Remote freedom: Work from anywhere, quarterly team retreats in amazing Asian locations

 sequences, calendars, pipelines)

Own client relationships from strategy to implementation to optimization

Translate business goals into automated systems that drive real results

Document processes and create SOPs to help the team level up

Collaborate with strategists and content creators to deliver integrated solutions

Stay ahead of GHL updates and bring innovations to client work

Contribute to team knowledge through training, documentation, and mentorship



What You Bring



Must-Haves:



Technical Skills:

2+ years hands-on experience with Go High Level (workflows, funnels,
 automation)

Proven ability to build complex, multi-step automations (show examples)

Understanding of marketing funnels, lead nurture, and sales processes

Comfortable with APIs, webhooks, and integrations (Zapier, custom code)

Strong problem-solving skills (debug confidently)



Communication & Collaboration:

Excellent written and verbal English (direct client communication)

Ability to explain technical concepts simply (teaching mindset)

Proactive communicator (update without being asked)

Async-first work style (remote team across timezones)



Cultural Fit (Non-Negotiable):

High performance, zero drama - excellent at what you do AND a joy to work with

Team-first mentality - collaboration over ego

Continuous learner - always evolving

World-class standards - quality is non-negotiable, details matter

Peaceful & Profitable believer - reject hustle culture, value sustainable excellence



Nice-to-Haves:

Experience with coaching/education industry

Copywriting skills 
 sequences, funnel copy)

Design sense (UX/conversion principles)

Previous remote work experience (disciplined, self-directed)

Based in Asia or comfortable with Asian timezone overlap



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture:

No all-nighters, performative hustle, or “rise and grind” BS

Clear boundaries, real vacation, team respects your time



Remote-First, Human-Centered:

Work from anywhere

Quarterly in-person retreats (Bangkok, Bali, Tokyo, etc.)

Connect deeply with teammates



Growth Path:

Skill training, leadership opportunities, expanding responsibilities

Where you grow, we grow



Team Culture You’ll Enjoy:

Weekly wins celebrated (all progress matters)

Quarterly retreats in rotating Asian locations

No brilliant jerks policy

Open communication, disagree without drama

Real work-life balance modeled from leadership



Compensation & Perks



Salary: SGD $800–1,200/month (based on experience)

Fully remote (work from anywhere)

Quarterly team retreats (3-4 days, expenses covered)

Flexible schedule (async-first, deep work protected)



Apply Now!

title: Research Assistant and Proposal Writer
description:
Please
 your resume, video intro, and portfolio related to the position to 
 



Job Title

 

Bid Researcher and Proposal Writer

 

 

Position Overview

 

We are seeking a highly detail oriented Bid Researcher and Proposal Writer with proven expertise in government and corporate contracting. This role is responsible for identifying high value opportunities, analyzing solicitation requirements, and developing competitive, compliant proposals that position the organization to win.

 

The ideal candidate understands public procurement processes, corporate sourcing systems, and strategic positioning. If you can diagnose the requirement, you can dominate the response.

 

 

 

Key Responsibilities

 

 

Opportunity Research and Qualification

 

 • Monitor federal, state, local, and corporate procurement portals daily

 • Identify RFPs, RFQs, RFIs, and ITBs aligned with company capabilities

 • Evaluate bid fit based on scope, eligibility, compliance, and competitiveness

 • Track deadlines, amendments, and submission requirements

 • Maintain an organized bid pipeline and reporting dashboard

 

 

RFP Analysis and Strategy

 

 • Review solicitation documents in full and extract key requirements

 • Develop compliance matrices and response outlines

 • Identify mandatory forms, certifications, and attachments

 • Assess evaluation criteria and scoring methodology

 • Collaborate with leadership to determine go or no go decisions

 

 

Proposal Writing and Development

 

 • Draft compelling executive summaries and technical responses

 • Translate complex requirements into clear, persuasive narratives

 • Align proposals with agency priorities and corporate objectives

 • Ensure proposals are compliant, responsive, and formatted correctly

 • Edit and refine content for clarity, strength, and impact

 

 

Coordination and Submission

 

 • Coordinate with subject matter experts to gather technical input

 • Collect resumes, past performance, financial data, and supporting documents

 • Ensure all submission components meet deadline and formatting rules

 • Manage electronic submissions through procurement portals

 

 

 

Required Qualifications

 

 • 3 to 5 years experience in government contracting, corporate procurement, or proposal writing

 • Demonstrated experience responding to RFPs, RFQs, and RFIs

 • Strong understanding of public procurement processes and compliance standards

 • Excellent writing, editing, and analytical skills

 • Ability to manage multiple deadlines under pressure

 • Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, and document formatting

 

 

 

Preferred Qualifications

 

 • Experience with federal and state procurement portals

 • Knowledge of minority owned, women owned, or small business certifications

 • Familiarity with compliance matrices and evaluation scoring systems

 • Experience in consulting, infrastructure, workforce development, or professional services proposals

 

 

 

Key Competencies

 

 • Precision under pressure

 • Strong research discipline

 • Strategic thinking

 • Clear, confident writing

 • Deadline driven execution

 • High attention to detail

 

 

 

Performance Metrics

 

 • Number of qualified opportunities identified monthly

 • Proposal submission rate

 • Compliance accuracy rate

 • Win rate improvement over time

 • On time submission rate

 

 

 

Why This Role Matters

 

Strong bids build strong revenue.

 

This role drives growth, visibility, and long term contract success. The right candidate will not just respond to opportunities. They will position the company to compete, comply, and win.

title: Business development manager
description:
Business Development Manager – Managed AI services



About the Role

We’re building a managed AI agent service that helps businesses reduce repetitive admin and run more smoothly.

This role is about selling operational clarity, not software licences or hype. You’ll speak to business owners and managers, understand how their work actually flows, and help them decide whether managed AI agents would remove friction.

This is consultative selling, not high-pressure closing.

What You’ll Be Doing

Reaching out to UK-based businesses (primarily via LinkedIn and
)

Booking and running short discovery calls

Using a simple assessment to identify operational pain points

Explaining our managed AI agent service in plain English

Qualifying opportunities honestly (saying “no” when it’s not a fit)

Closing clients into a clear setup + monthly retainer model

Maintaining relationships and spotting opportunities for add-ons

You’ll sell outcomes (less admin, fewer interruptions), not technical features.

Who You’re Talking To

Owners and directors of small to mid-sized businesses

Professional services, agencies, property, admin-heavy services

Typically 5–30 staff, growing, busy, slightly chaotic

These buyers value trust and clarity over clever sales talk.

What We’re Looking For

You don’t need deep AI knowledge. You do need strong business sense.

You’re likely a good fit if you:

Are comfortable speaking with business owners

Ask good questions and listen properly

Can explain complex ideas simply

Are calm, professional, and organised

Prefer consultative selling to aggressive tactics

Experience

B2B sales experience (services or solutions preferred)

Comfortable with LinkedIn outreach and video/phone calls

Experience selling retainers or managed services is a big plus

What This Role Is Not

Not cold-calling all day

Not transactional SaaS selling

Not “AI evangelism”

Not commission-at-all-costs culture

How We Sell

Short operational assessment first

Clear scope and pricing

Full setup fee upfront

Monthly managed service thereafter

Long-term relationships, not quick churn

Compensation

Base + commission (open to structure)

Commission on setup and ongoing retainer

Remote-friendly

How to Apply

Send:

A short note on why this role suits you

Brief background in B2B sales

One-Line Summary (For Job Boards)

Help businesses remove operational friction using calm, managed AI services.

title: Executive Assistant / Partnerships & Operations Coordinator
description:
Untamed Agency is a fast-growing, AAPI-founded talent and influencer management agency representing creators, entrepreneurs, and cultural leaders across lifestyle, fashion, wellness, beauty, entertainment, and community impact.

We’re known for high-touch influencer campaigns, premium brand partnerships, and large-scale events — including our annual Untamed AAPI Holiday Charity Gala.



As we continue to grow, we’re looking for a highly organized, proactive Executive Assistant / Partnerships & Operations Coordinator to support our Founder and leadership team.



About the Role



This role acts as a key liaison and operational support across partnerships, talent, and internal operations.

It’s ideal for someone who loves organization, coordination, and relationship management — and wants exposure to the creator economy without being commission-based (yet).

This role has a clear growth path into:

• Operations Manager

• Partnerships Lead

• Talent Agent



What You’ll Do



Partnerships & Liaison Support



• Act as a liaison on behalf of the Founder with brands, partners, PR agencies, and collaborators

• Manage inboxes, scheduling, follow-ups, and next steps

• Track brand conversations, deal stages, timelines, and deliverables

• Assist with outreach using existing templates, decks, and materials



Talent & Influencer Support



• Support influencer communication and relationship touchpoints

• Maintain organized talent trackers and rosters

• Assist with pitching creators using existing materials

• Track campaign deliverables and deadlines



Operations & Organization



• Maintain and organize Google Drive folders, trackers, and shared docs

• Support SOP documentation and workflow improvements

• Keep systems clean, accurate, and up to date

• Help bring structure to fast-moving operations



Events & Activations



• Support planning and execution of events and activations

• Assist with guest lists, RSVPs, logistics, and follow-ups

• Support on-site coordination when applicable



Who You Are



• Highly organized, proactive, and reliable

• Comfortable acting on behalf of leadership

• Strong communicator with great follow-through

• Calm under pressure and able to juggle priorities

• Interested in long-term growth within an agency



You Bring



• Strong written and verbal communication skills

• Experience with Google Drive, Google Sheets, and admin tools

• Comfort working independently in a remote/hybrid environment

• A polished, professional demeanor

• Availability for occasional in-person meetings or events



Bonus (not required):



• Experience in influencer marketing, talent management, PR, or events

• Familiarity with CRMs, Notion, Airtable, or scheduling tools

• Canva or light content coordination experience



Compensation & Growth



• Hourly or monthly retainer 

• Performance-based increases

• Clear path to expanded responsibility and leadership roles



How to Apply



Please send:

• A brief intro

• Relevant experience

• Availability (hours per week)

• Desired rate

• Why this role interests you long-term

title: Call Center Booker
description:
About the Company



We are a growing lifestyle health and medical aesthetics organization focused on personal enhancement, wellness, and long-term performance. Our mission is to empower clients to look better, feel better, and live longer through ethical, client-centered care.



We are not a typical medical organization. We value professionalism, accountability, and long-term client relationships. Every interaction reflects our standards and brand reputation.



?



Position Objective



The Call Centre Booker plays a critical role in business growth by converting inbound and outbound leads into high-quality, motivated consultation bookings for our medical sales team.



This role is not about volume alone. The focus is on booking consultations that show up prepared, engaged, and ready to move forward.



The ideal candidate is confident, articulate, and customer-focused, with the ability to build trust quickly, qualify intent, and guide conversations toward a clear next step.



You are self-driven, coachable, and committed to continuous improvement. You take ownership of outcomes and understand that every conversation shapes the client experience.



Roles and Responsibilities



Lead Handling and Booking

 • Answer inbound calls, web inquiries, and digital lead forms promptly and professionally

 • Conduct outbound follow-up with warm leads, past inquiries, and unbooked prospects

 • Clearly explain services, consultation process, and expectations

 • Book consultations aligned with treatment suitability and clinic capacity



Lead Qualification

 • Assess client needs, readiness, timelines, and level of intent

 • Ask thoughtful questions to determine fit and seriousness

 • Set appropriate expectations to reduce low-intent bookings

 • Politely redirect or defer non-qualified inquiries when necessary



Conversion and Consult Readiness

 • Build confidence and excitement around the consultation experience

 • Address hesitation and objections with clarity and professionalism

 • Prepare clients so they arrive informed, on time, and motivated

 • Support strong booking-to-show ratios and overall conversion outcomes



CRM and Communication

 • Accurately document all interactions and follow-up activity in the CRM

 • Maintain organized records for seamless handoff to the sales team

 • Follow scripts and call flows while maintaining a natural tone

 • Uphold brand standards, professionalism, and confidentiality



Ideal Candidate Profile

 • 1 to 3+ years experience in call center booking, inside sales, or client conversion

 • Experience in medical aesthetics, wellness, cosmetic, or healthcare industries is an asset

 • Strong verbal communication and active listening skills

 • Comfortable guiding conversations toward decisions without pressure

 • Customer-centric with a hospitality mindset

 • Organized and comfortable working in CRM systems

 • Open to coaching and continuous performance improvement



What Success Looks Like

 • High-quality consultations that show up

 • Strong booking-to-show ratios

 • Clients arriving prepared and engaged

 • Consistent representation of company values and standards

title: Full-Time Video Editor with AI Expertise
description:
Role Overview

We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor with a strong background in AI-driven content creation. The ideal candidate will be responsible for editing short-form video ads and generating visual assets using AI tools. This role requires a blend of creative storytelling, technical proficiency, and a keen eye for detail.



Key Responsibilities

Edit and assemble engaging short-form videos for Meta and TikTok advertising campaigns.

Utilize AI tools to generate video clips and images, enhancing the visual appeal of our content.

Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and execute ad creatives that align with brand guidelines and campaign objectives.

Manage and organize media assets efficiently, ensuring timely delivery of projects.

title: Junior App Testing & Customer Success Trainee
description:
Junior App Testing & Customer Success Trainee – (Bangkok-Remote)

Location: Bangkok?

Language: English is a must & Thai is a bonus?

Commitment: Minimum 8 hours per day, 5 days per week?Duration: 12 months (with potential full time renewal)?

Start Date: ASAP



About Stitch

Stitch is a FashionTech startup transforming how tailor shops and fabric suppliers operate across Asia. Our CRM and BI platform helps traditional tailoring businesses move from paper notebooks and scattered WhatsApp messages to a structured, AI powered system built specifically for their industry.

Already trusted by shops across Thailand and expanding into Hong Kong, Stitch sits at the intersection of fashion, technology, and small business transformation.



Role Overview

This is not a purely desk based role.

You will combine:

Product testing and quality control

In person customer onboarding

Data migration and system setup

Field based customer support in Bangkok

You will work directly with tailor shops and fabric suppliers, helping them transition from paper records to Stitch while also testing the platform to identify bugs, usability issues, and improvement opportunities.

This role requires responsibility, organisation, and comfort interacting with business owners face to face.



Key Responsibilities

App Testing & Quality Control

Test new features before release and document bugs clearly.

Reproduce issues reported by clients and provide structured feedback to the product team.

Identify UX friction points and suggest practical improvements.

Maintain structured testing notes in shared documents.

In Person Customer Success

Visit tailor shops in Bangkok to onboard new users.

Guide shop owners and staff through the Stitch platform step by step.

Answer questions in Thai and provide clear explanations of features.

Ensure clients reach basic operational usage within the first two weeks.

Data Migration & Setup

Upload and structure client measurements, order history, and fabric records.

Digitise paper notebooks and Excel sheets into the Stitch system.

Assist fabric suppliers in publishing digital swatch books and product data.

Verify accuracy of migrated data before final confirmation.

Customer Support & Coordination

Coordinate appointments with shops.

Provide friendly, professional follow up in Thai and English.

Track onboarding progress and report status.

Escalate technical issues clearly to the development team.



Requirements

Based in Bangkok.

Fluent in Thai (spoken and written).

Comfortable communicating in English.

Able to commit to minimum 6 hours per day, 5 days per week.

Available for 6 months minimum, starting ASAP.

Comfortable visiting clients in person across Bangkok.

Detail oriented and patient when handling data entry.

Comfortable using spreadsheets (Google Sheets or Excel).

Confident testing a web application and documenting issues clearly.

Organised and able to work independently.



Preferred but Not Required

Experience in customer service, retail, or support roles.

Familiarity with tailoring, fashion retail, or small business culture.

Basic understanding of SaaS platforms or CRM systems.

Experience doing structured testing or quality control work.



What You Will Gain

Direct exposure to real startup operations.

Experience in SaaS onboarding and product testing.

Hands on field experience with tailor shops and fabric suppliers.

Mentorship from the Stitch founding team.

Clear operational responsibilities, not shadowing work.

Transportation reimbursement for approved client visits.

Possibility to transition into a paid full time role if performance and alignment are strong after 6 months.



Important

It requires consistent presence, reliability, and professional behaviour.

It is best suited for someone who wants practical startup experience and is comfortable working directly with small business owners.



How to Apply

Send your CV and a short message 

Please include:

Why you’re interested in this role.

Any experience with customer support, data handling, or testing.

Confirmation of availability (hours per day, days per week).

Your earliest possible start date.

title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel – Motion Graphics & Shorts
description:
Summary

I'm starting a new YouTube channel focused on AI, automation, and marketing. I'm looking for a talented video editor to help bring this channel to life.



## What I Am Looking For



I need a video editor who can take raw scene clips and turn them into polished, engaging content — both as standalone Shorts and as a full-length YouTube video. You should be comfortable with motion graphics, on-screen overlays, and creating content that keeps viewers watching. I value speed, consistency, and a strong creative eye.



## What You'll Be Doing



Each video consists of approximately 6 short scenes (100–120 seconds each). Your workflow for every video will be:



1. Take each individual scene (100–120 second clips) and edit them as standalone YouTube Shorts — clean transitions, text overlays, relevant graphics, and motion elements that make each Short feel polished and engaging on its own. Some videos will have fewer scenes since not all scenes will be ‘Short-worthy,’ but I record in 120-second increments, so the full video is around 8 minutes and will have around 6 scenes.



2. Merge all 6 edited scenes together into one cohesive long-form YouTube video with smooth transitions between scenes, consistent branding, and professional pacing.



So every deliverable set includes around 3–6 Shorts + 1 full YouTube video



## Specific Skills Needed



Proficient in CapCut Pro (this is required — no exceptions). Motion graphics and animated overlays including lower thirds, callouts, kinetic text, and relevant on-screen graphics. Strong sense of pacing, transitions, and visual storytelling. Experience editing YouTube content specifically, with an understanding of retention, hooks, and platform best practices. Ability to create vertical Shorts from horizontal footage with proper reframing.



## To Apply



Got it — here is the **fully consolidated, final version** with your software experience questions added and everything cleaned up and ready to post/apply:



---



## To Apply



You **must** include your portfolio or reel in your proposal. Applications without a portfolio will not be considered.



Please answer the following:



1. Do you have experience with **Adobe Premiere**, **Adobe After Effects**, and **CapCut**?

2. How many years of experience do you have with each tool?

3. Please provide your portfolio or reel (required).



Also, share examples of YouTube videos and/or Shorts you’ve edited — especially any work that includes motion graphics or overlay work. Bonus points if you can provide before-and-after examples showing raw footage compared to the final edit.



There is an opportunity for this role to become full-time. However, I’m looking to start with someone on a freelance or per-video basis. As we begin working together, there will be a high volume of videos, and for the right candidate, I’m open to transitioning into a full-time position.



I’m looking forward to finding a long-term editor who can grow with the channel. If you’re fast, creative, and detail-oriented, I’d love to hear from you.



---
